description.brazilian: Completa todas las pistas del tutorial

description.brazilian: Consigue un trofeo en cada variante modificada de la pista
description.english: Achieve a trophy for each modified track variant
description.french: Obtiens un trophée pour chaque version de piste modifiée
description.german: Erhalte eine Trophäe für jede modifizierte Streckenvariante
description.italian: Conquista un trofeo per ogni variante modificata del percorso
description.japanese: 改造トラックの種類ごとにトロフィーを獲得する
description.koreana: 각각의 변형 트랙 버전에서 트로피를 획득하세요.
description.polish: Zdobądź trofeum za każdy zmodyfikowany wariant toru
description.russian: Выиграйте трофей за каждый модифицированный вариант трассы
description.schinese: 为每个改装赛道变体赢得奖杯
description.spanish: Conquiste um troféu para cada variante de pista modificada
description.tchinese: 為每個改裝賽道變體贏得獎杯
description.turkish: Modifiye edilmiş her pist çeşidi için bir kupa kazan

displayName.french: T'as jamais raté un cours d'EPS?
displayName.german: Du hast nie den Sportunterricht geschwänzt, oder?
displayName.japanese: 体育をサボったことは？
displayName.russian: Вы ведь никогда не пропускали уроки физкультуры, да?
displayName.spanish: Você nunca faltou à aula de educação física, né?
displayName.turkish: Beden eğitimini hiç atlamadın, değil mi?
